name: Nightmare Rescue
description:
Description:

You and your friends have been cast into a dream realm. You made it to the Dream World, however, your friends were sent to it's other side, the Nightmare World. You must rescue them!

Controls:

Move with LEFT and RIGHT arrows (or A and D).

Jump with UP arrow (or W).

Collect all fireflies in each dream world. Once you have all the fireflies of that level, seek the Dream Guardian and press SPACE to enter the Nightmare World and seek out your friends. Beware of hazards!

Dev Notes:

This is my submission for the Game Endevour #3 Jam which is my first game jam ever! This is also my first, somewhat finished game in the Godot engine. I'd like to return to this project to add more levels, music, sfx, and story!
